```{r}
source("DGP-binary.R")

# parameters
px <- 4
p_bin <- 1
py <- 2
beta <- matrix(runif(px * 2, -0.7, 0.7), nrow = px, ncol = py)
H <- 60
m_hosp <- rep(1000, 60)
sigma_u = c(0.3,0.6)                       
sigma = 0.5                           
rho   = 0.75                           

dat <- generate_data_mv_bin(
    seed = 123,
    H = H,                                 
    m_hosp = m_hosp,
    px = px,                                 
    p_bin = p_bin,                            
    py = py,                                 
    beta = beta,  
    sigma_u = sigma_u,                          
    sigma = sigma,                           
    rho   = rho                            
)
dat
```
